code: import{useContext}from"react";import SingleEdTechContext from"../../context/SingleEdTechContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EdTechGallery=()=>{const{singleEdTechData}=useContext(SingleEdTechContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-3 sm:gap-10 mt-12",children:singleEdTechData.EdTechImages.map(EdTech=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-10 sm:mb-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:EdTech.img,className:"rounded-xl cursor-pointer shadow-lg sm:shadow-none",alt:EdTech.title},EdTech.id)},EdTech.id);})});};export default EdTechGallery;
